title: The Bunk Bed Brothers
description: Join Cam and Braydon on their famous Bunk Bed Brothers adventures... Dad surprises his boys with a cool new addition to their bunk beds, The Virtual Dream Catcher. At first, the boys simply appreciate their dad's creativity and play along. However, one fateful night, when things go a little crazy, the boys realize just how powerful their minds can be. With the help of his big brother, Braydon, by his side, Cam discovers that dreams can come true... Well, sort of, in a way. From that night on, bed time took on a whole new meaning. Now, Cam and Braydon can't wait until bedtime. With each new dream they find themselves sharing in the same crazy, cool, and funny, adventures all the while, fast asleep in their, you guessed it, bunk beds.
author: Scott Glasgow
